mapper.select: select count(*) from investigation where ${searchType} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'

select investigationnum , url , title , content , useremail , to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate , hitcount , recommendation , decommendation from investigation where ${searchType} like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
select investigationnum , url , title , content , useremail , to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate , hitcount , recommendation , decommendation from investigation where url = #{url}

select investigationnum , url , title , content , useremail , to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate , hitcount , recommendation , decommendation from investigation where investigationnum = #{investigationnum}
